title: Relationship Descriptor

xdm:destinationSchema.title: Destination Schema
xdm:destinationSchema.description: The destination schema this descriptor applies to

xdm:destinationProperty.title: Destination Property
xdm:destinationProperty.description: When present, the property of the destination schema to which this descriptor applies. This value is a JSON Pointer, applied to an instance of an object described by 'xdm:destSchema'

xdm:destinationItem.title: Destination Item
xdm:destinationItem.description: When present, the selector used to match a specific item in the array pointed to by destProperty

xdm:sourceValue.title: Source Value
xdm:sourceValue.description: When present, provides additional information about the values in that field. Descriptor producer and consumer should coordinate on how to use this field, e.g. defining rules on formats, values, and operations.

xdm:label.title: Label
xdm:label.description: Provides a user friendly name or label to this relationship

xdm:apiLabel.title: API Label
xdm:apiLabel.description: Provides a user friendly name or label which is used in PQL/SQL or other needs

xdm:description.title: Relationship Description
xdm:description.description: Provides a user friendly description of this relationship
